summary: Jane L. Doe, born on December 1, 1967, is a 60-inch tall female weighing 67 kg. Her primary care physician is Bill D. McAllister, MD. Jane is currently taking levothyroxine and gabapentin, received Pfizer COVID-19 vaccines on November 1, 2021, and February 23, 2022, underwent Hemithyroidectomy on December 3, 1991, and Hysterectomy on May 1, 2005, and has chronic conditions including alcohol abuse (ICD-10: F10.10) and dementia (ICD-10: F03.94).
